data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Levante at Camp Nou.
In the minute 1, Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a Barcelona throw-in in Levante's half.
Barcelona's Philippe Coutinho gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Levante goal kick.
In the minute 3, Levante have been awarded a corner by Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea.
Free kick for Barcelona in the half of Levante.
Barcelona to take a throw-in in Levante territory.
In the minute 5, At Camp Nou, Barcelona are penalized for being offside.
Throw-in for Barcelona in their own half.
In Barcelona a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 8, Ball safe as Barcelona is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Barcelona.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 10, Corner awarded to Barcelona.
Levante needs to be cautious. Barcelona have an attacking throw-in.
Levante drives forward and Jorge De Frutos Sebastian gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Barcelona close to the penalty box.
Barcelona drive upfield and Lionel Messi gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Levante defender.
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
In the minute 15, Levante awarded a free kick in their own half.
Barcelona awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Barcelona's Martin Braithwaite is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 16, Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea.
Throw-in high up the field for Barcelona in Barcelona.
Free kick for Barcelona in their own half.
In the minute 19, In Barcelona Levante attack through Dani Gomez. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Barcelona.
Antoine Griezmann of Barcelona smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 21, Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a free kick to Barcelona.
Barcelona's Clement Lenglet breaks free at Camp Nou. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea awards Levante a goal kick.
In the minute 24, Corner awarded to Barcelona.
Goal kick for Levante at Camp Nou.
Levante's Coke misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 25, Barcelona have a goal kick.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Levante have a goal kick.
In the minute 28, Levante have been awarded a corner by Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea.
In Barcelona Levante drive forward through Dani Gomez. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea.
In the minute 33, Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a free kick to Levante in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Levante goal kick.
Free kick in a good position for Barcelona!
In the minute 37, Lionel Messi (Barcelona) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
Barcelona pushes forward through Jordi Alba, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 38, Corner awarded to Barcelona.
Free kick Barcelona.
Barcelona pushes forward through Antoine Griezmann, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 40, Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Barcelona.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a free kick to Barcelona.
In the minute 42, Nikola Vukcevic is booked for the away team.
Lionel Messi of Barcelona smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for Levante in the half of Barcelona.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Barcelona.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea awards the home team a throw-in.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea has blown to start the second-half.
Can Barcelona capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Levante's half?
Goal kick for Barcelona at Camp Nou.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Levante in the half of Barcelona.
Frenkie De Jong (Barcelona) has received a first yellow card.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea awards Barcelona a goal kick.
In the minute 51, Barcelona's Lionel Messi is on target but unsuccessful.
Barcelona have a goal kick.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a free kick to Barcelona in their own half.
In the minute 52, Philippe Coutinho for Barcelona gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Barcelona.
Throw-in for Barcelona at Camp Nou.
In the minute 54, In Barcelona Barcelona attack through Lionel Messi. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Levante goal kick.
Can Levante get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Barcelona's half?
In the minute 56, Free kick Barcelona.
Barcelona's Philippe Coutinho gets in a shot on goal at Camp Nou. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea.
In the minute 58, Barcelona's Antoine Griezmann is whistled for offside at Camp Nou.
Ronald Koeman (Barcelona) is making a first substitution, with Pedri replacing Sergio Busquets.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea.
In the minute 62, Barcelona's Antoine Griezmann gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Levante at Camp Nou.
Barcelona drives forward and Lionel Messi gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 64, Can Barcelona capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Lionel Messi gets his shot on target but fails to score for Barcelona.
Barcelona advance rapidly upfield but Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea blows for offside.
In the minute 66, Barcelona are in shooting range from this free kick.
Barcelona attack but Clement Lenglet's header doesn't find the target.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea awards Levante a goal kick.
In the minute 67, Paco Lopez is making the team's first substitution at Camp Nou with Nemanja Radoja replacing Nikola Vukcevic.
The away team have replaced Coke with Jorge Miramon. This is the second substitution made today by Paco Lopez.
Levante make their third substitution with Jose Luis Morales replacing Roger Marti.
In the minute 70, Ball safe as Levante is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Trincao is replacing Philippe Coutinho for Barcelona at Camp Nou.
Lionel Messi for Barcelona drives towards goal at Camp Nou. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 72, Corner awarded to Barcelona.
Martin Braithwaite of Barcelona gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Barcelona.
In the minute 74, Levante to take a throw-in in Barcelona territory.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a Levante throw-in in Barcelona's half.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Lionel Messi.
In the minute 76, Frenkie De Jong with an assist there.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a throw-in for Barcelona, close to Levante's area.
Free kick for Barcelona in their own half.
In the minute 82, Levante awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Barcelona in their own half.
The away team replace Gonzalo Melero with Sergio Leon.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a free kick to Barcelona in their own half.
In the minute 83, Paco Lopez is making the team's fifth substitution at Camp Nou with Son replacing Jorge De Frutos Sebastian.
Throw-in for Levante in the half of Barcelona.
In the minute 86, Goal kick for Levante at Camp Nou.
Levante awarded a free kick in their own half.
Martin Braithwaite (Barcelona) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 88, Levante have a dangerous throw-in.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea awards Barcelona a goal kick.
Samuel Umtiti is on a sub for Antoine Griezmann for Barcelona.
Barcelona push upfield but Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea quickly pulls them for offside.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a throw-in for Levante, close to Barcelona's area.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Jose Luis Morales (Levante) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Levante have been awarded a corner by Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea.
Levante's Son gets in a shot on goal at Camp Nou. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Levante.
Full-time! The final score is 1-0.
